name: Corridors (Ivanything437)
description: This is an early prototype of a game I don't know what it'll be about. It really is just a walking simulator while you walk through a randomly generated maze that builds in front of you. I also ask if anyone who plays this can think of any ideas for gameplay to add to this game since it's just a simple walking simulator. This random generation I think is cool and could work for a game but I don't know what.
